Art. 4.70. 
Action for partition with minors and protected adults 
The action for partition with regard to co-heirs who are minors or adults declared incapable of alienating property by virtue of article 492/1, ¤ 2, of the former Civil Code, may be exercised by their guardian or administrator specially authorised for that purpose by the Justice of the Peace of the place of guardianship or administration.
